overview: The story of a group of neighbors who years ago formed a choir in a neighborhood of Montevideo. The choir is a way of fighting against loneliness, a meeting place, but after the rehearsals or acting, the neighbors must return to their routines.

production_companies.name: Instituto del Cine y Audiovisual del Uruguay (ICAU)
Conferencia de Autoridades Cinematográficas de Iberoamérica (CACI)

title: Los de siempre
